did.unittitle: Correspondence and papers concerning Big Sisters Club; community resources list

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Committee composed of the chairman of International Relations, Community Services, Altrusa Information, Vocational Services committees, the ex-officio Board Member, and volunteers. The Ex-officio Board Member was filled by the Altrusa member who served on the Board of Directors of the Big Sisters.
